hint: Start to slice by clicking and dragging on a surface in the scene
voxelHint: Start to slice by clicking and dragging on a surface in the scene. Voxel layers treat the slice as an infinite plane.
excludeHint: Pick a layer in the view to exclude it from the slice
verticalHint: Hold the Shift key to force a vertical slice.
verticalHint2: Hold the Shift key to always slice vertically.
unsupported: Slice is not supported in MapView.
multipleDisabled: Only one slice may be active at a time
pickLayer: Pick a layer from the view
